channel.title: Meta-discussions
channel.description:
Just wondering whether, after the discussion of [Meta-meta discussions](https://forum.openglobalmind.com/t/meta-meta-discussions/406) we might start to move in the direction of concrete discussions!
That said, as I pointed out somewhere on the mailing list, "discussion" is etymologically related to taking things apart: https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/discutio#Latin

item.title: Meta-discussions
item.dc:creator: holtzermann17
item.description:
Making things — one of the roles is “Maker” — is in this sense the opposite of discussions. It involves putting things (and people) together: https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/congrego#Etymology

Roles, redux

The primary function of the “Makers”, or “Creators” is to create – or shepherd the creation of – tools and services.

(Quoting the upstream OGM site.)

Read full topic
